discourse_list.title: Collateral Onboarding Call #35: Nebula Capital Partners LTD - Wednesday, August 11 4PM UTC

content.content: Collateral Onboarding Call #35: Nebula - Wednesday, August 11 4PM UTC  1280×720 65.7 KB  Time in your local-timezone format: 2021-08-11T16:00:00Z Mark it on your Google Calendar!  Dial In Details Zoom call Passcode: RWA-WG  Intro An open discussion where we discuss projects and potential assets for MCD, open for anyone to join. If you’d like to present, check out this thread.  Agenda Intro by @JuanJuan Presentation by Markus Hunold (@MH_NCP)  Nebula Capital Partners LTD — https://www.nebula-capital.com  MIP6: [NCP01-DROP] MIP6 Application: European Point-of-Sales Consumer Finance Portfolio “Nebula Capital Partners LTD (“NCP”) is a UK based investment advisor that was established to focus on investments in portfolios of granular credit assets originated by Western-European FinTech lending platforms (i.e. credit assets originated by technology enabled non-bank specialty finance credit origination, underwriting and servicing platforms).”  Attn: @Risk-Core-Unit, @GovAlpha-Core-Unit , @Protocol-Engineering, @Real-World-Finance, @flipflopflapdelegate, @ejbarraza, @_LS, @planet_x, @g_dip, @PaperImperium, @twblack88, @monet-supply
This full call is now available for review on the MakerDAO Youtube channel:

Collateral Call Summary - Episode #35  August 11th, 2021  Agenda   00:00: Intro with Juan Guillén  01:20: Nebula Capital Partners with Markus Hunold and Karlheinz Toni  39:09: Q&A and Discussion about Nebula Capital Partners  56:34: Outro   Video https://youtu.be/ir2qZyHqTxc  Introduction  Juan Guillén  Agenda and Preamble 00:00  Hello everyone! Welcome to another MakerDAO collateral call. Today we have Nebula Capital Partners. They will be talking about their mechanism, how it works regarding Real-World Finance. My name is Juan. I am the facilitator of the Sustainable Ecosystem Scaling CU and I am joined, among others,  by Lea from Centrifuge and Sébastien from RWF CU. Discussions about collateral happen in the Forum.    Collateral Nebula Capital Partners  [NCP01-DROP] MIP6 Application: European Point-of-Sales Consumer Finance Portfolio - Forum Thread   Markus Hunold and Karlheinz Toni  Presentation 01:20  Intro1438×813 110 KB   Agenda1430×858 88.9 KB   Overview & Background1435×814 205 KB   Core Team & Experience1436×815 146 KB   Role & Value Add 1/21437×810 152 KB   Role & Value Add 2/21434×813 138 KB   Tinka  Tinka1439×809 89.4 KB   Our mission1436×809 264 KB   Our Business1439×812 89.9 KB   Our Assets1435×809 149 KB   Helps Merchants Grow1436×808 132 KB   Our Consumers1440×808 130 KB   Appreciated by Customers1437×811 97.5 KB   Defaults & Recoveries1436×809 144 KB   Transaction, Timeline and Next Steps  Overview & next steps1435×855 56.7 KB   Transaction - overview1440×861 202 KB   Transaction - timeline1435×809 167 KB   Appendix  FinTech - Digital Lending 1/21429×807 156 KB   FinTech - Digital Lending 2/21433×812 155 KB   Discussion   39:09 - Payton Rose: How are you going to be handling the currency risk on your side going from Dai to Euro?   47:13 - Planet_X: You have a huge client base that does not have a lot of funds, and would be in a poor position during an economic downturn. How are you doing your own risk management with regards to the economic upturns and downturns?   51:27 - Planet_X: The “long-term US consumer credit” on your screen, can you also apply that to the Netherlands?   52:00 - Someone: In our system, MKR holders have to approve all the things we do. From your perspective, what is the largest risk that MKR holders should be aware of if we were to open up this credit line    Closing Comment  Juan Guillén  Outro 56:34  Really clear and good presentation! For anyone watching offline, we will keep the discussions going on the forum. Thanks to all of you!   Credits  Gala Guillén produced this summary. Everyone who spoke and presented on the call, listed in the headers.
This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
